{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_stride/mapping/title|required_span_size}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_stride/mapping/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr index_type required_span_size() const noexcept;
}}
Returns the required size of the mapping.

Let {{c|s}} be equal to:
* {{c|1}}, if {{c|1=extents().rank() == 0}} is {{c|true}},
* otherwise, {{c|0}}, if the size of the multidimensional index space {{c|extents()}} is {{c|0}},
* otherwise, {{c|1}} plus the sum of products of {{c|extents().extent(r) - 1}} and {{box|{{c/core|extents_type::}}{{tti|index-cast}}{{c/core|(strides_[r])}}}} for all {{c|r}} in the range {{range|0|extents().rank()}}.

A call is equivalent to {{c|return s;}}.

===Return value===
The required size of the mapping.
